request.description: Get user1 to assgin contact records
Get user1 to assgin contact records
Get user1 to assgin contact records

exec: console.log("record does not exist in the org");

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version=\"1.0\" output-format=\"xml-platform\" mapping=\"logical\" distinct=\"false\">\n <entity name=\"contact\">\n <attribute name=\"fullname\" />\n <attribute name=\"telephone1\" />\n <attribute name=\"contactid\" />\n <order attribute=\"fullname\" descending=\"false\" />\n <filter type=\"and\">\n <condition attribute=\"firstname\" operator=\"like\" value=\"Trigger{{Triggerglobalsessionvalue}}%\" />\n </filter>\n </entity>\n</fetch>",
   "cmc_baseentity":"contact",
   "cmc_baseentityname":"contact",
   "cmc_FallBackUserId@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{gFallbackuser}})",
   "cmc_assigntofield":"ownerid",
   "cmc_name":"SampleAssignmentGroup1",
   "statuscode":1,
   "statecode":0,
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})"
}

{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version=\"1.0\" output-format=\"xml-platform\" mapping=\"logical\" distinct=\"false\">\n  <entity name=\"contact\">\n    <attribute name=\"fullname\" />\n    <attribute name=\"telephone1\" />\n    <attribute name=\"contactid\" />\n    <order attribute=\"fullname\" descending=\"false\" />\n    <filter type=\"and\">\n      <condition attribute=\"address1_postalcode\" operator=\"eq\" value=\"560093\" />\n    </filter>\n  </entity>\n</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":1,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"Triggerrule1{{$randomInt}}",
   "statuscode":1,
   "statecode":0,
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"contact",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssigntoUser1}})",  
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gtriggerassignmentgroupid}})"
}

request.description:
Contacttype=Student and
Area of Interest Name should starts with "BIO"

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="contact">
    <attribute name="fullname" />
    <attribute name="telephone1" />
    <attribute name="contactid" />
    <order attribute="fullname" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <filter type="or">
        <condition attribute="address1_postalcode" operator="eq" value="560094" />
        <condition attribute="address1_postalcode" operator="eq" value="560095" />
      </filter>
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":2,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"Triggerrule2{{$randomInt}}",
   "statuscode":1,
   "statecode":0,
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"contact",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssignDOMtoUser2}})",
      "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gtriggerassignmentgroupid}})"
}

{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
 <entity name="contact">
 <attribute name="fullname" />
 <attribute name="telephone1" />
 <attribute name="contactid" />
 <order attribute="fullname" descending="false" />
 <filter type="and">
 <condition attribute="firstname" operator="like" value="API{{globalsessionvalue}}%" />
 </filter>
 </entity>
</fetch>",
   "cmc_baseentity":"contact",
   "cmc_FallBackUserId@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{gFallbackuser}})",
   "cmc_assigntofield":"ownerid",
   "cmc_name":"Balatest{{$randomInt}}",
   "statuscode":1,
   "statecode":0,
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})"
}
